title: Apprentice's Scarf
summaries: The Apprentice's Scarf is a Hardmode (on the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, pre-Hardmode) accessory that increases the player's maximum number of sentries by one and increases summon damage by 10%. On [img:Desktop version] Desktop, [img:Console version] Console, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile, it is dropped by the Dark Mage during the Old One's Army event with an 25% / 50% chance, while on [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console, 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version], and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader, it is dropped by the Ogre with an 8.33% / 12.5% (T2) or 4.17% (T3) chance.
